Package squidpony.squidai.astar

Interface Graph<N>

Type Parameters:
N - Type of node
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultGraph
public interface Graph<N>
A graph is a collection of nodes, each one having a collection of outgoing connections. Because this works with indexed A*, each node must also have a unique index.
Many users will be fine with DefaultGraph as the only kind of Graph they need to use.
Author:
davebaol

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<Connection<N>> getConnections​(N fromNode)
    Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
    int getIndex​(N node)
    Returns the unique index of the given node.
    int getNodeCount()
    Returns the number of nodes in this graph.

      Returns the connections outgoing from the given node.
      Parameters:

      Returns:

      int getIndex​(N node)
      Returns the unique index of the given node.
      Parameters:
      node - the node whose index will be returned
      Returns:
      the unique index of the given node.

    • getNodeCount

      int getNodeCount()
      Returns the number of nodes in this graph.
